title.rendered: Staking on Algorand (ALGO) | A complete Atomic Wallet Guide

content.rendered:
Staking Algorand (Algo) with Atomic Wallet is easy as 1-2-3. First, you need to download and install the app. Then, follow these steps:

  1. Open Atomic Wallet.
  2. Get ALGO coins. You can exchange it from any other currency right in the wallet interface.
  3. Click on Staking at the left menu.
  4. Choose Algorand on the list.
  5. You will see the staking interface: Yearly Yield, and the conditions of staking.
  6. To get the rewards, just hold Algorand on your Atomic Wallet balance. Dividends will be distributed to your address with the creation of every new block.

Check the full detailed guide here.
